msg.msgText:
A protocol plug-in can be created by using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create Plugin help imaserver create Plugin "File=value" imaserver create Plugin "File=value" "PropertiesFile=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver create Plugin "File=jsonplugin.zip" imaserver create Plugin "File=jsonplugin.zip" "PropertiesFile=pluginprops.json"
Configuration items for the "Plugin" object: File Specifies the protocol plug-in zip file name. PropertiesFile Specifies the protocol plug-in properties file name.
NOTES: 1. Enclose each key=value pair within double quotation marks. 2. File is a required item.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
